name: TOMATOK
description: Tomatok, a blockchain-based chat messenger Tomatok, a blockchain-based De-fi global messenger, offers a variety of services, including voice call services connected to application data, Solana-based token wallets, and blockchain games. Blockchain DeFi Messenger TomaTok, a service provided by NEEDSPERSAND Co., Ltd., plans to provide convenient app services based on blockchain technology to various users around the world by installing AI functions such as cryptocurrency asset management and chat services in real-time translation chat services, pre-call, video calls in more than 120 countries, and introducing in-house game services and blockchain games.
